                                                                                                                        【谢谢你！战“疫”中，每一位平凡英雄！】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 他们，不舍昼夜，无畏战斗；他们，奋战一线，坚守阵地；他们，义无反顾，冲锋向前……我想说声：“谢谢你！战‘疫’中，每一位平凡英雄！” <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网黑龙江频道">@人民网黑龙江频道</a> <a title="谢谢你！战“疫”中，每一位平凡英雄！" href="http://t.cn/A6hJbz9i" alt="http://t.cn/A6hJbz9i" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>谢谢你！战“疫”中，每一位平凡英雄！</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472662275880593" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuuhdoFOh?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 18:34" date="1581849247000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472662275880593:fromprofile"> 2月16日 18:34</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B7%8B%E6%88%90%E9%9B%AA%E4%BA%BA%E7%9A%84%E5%A4%A7%E7%88%B7%E6%9C%89%E9%97%A8%E5%8D%AB%E6%88%BF%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#淋成雪人的大爷有门卫房了#</a>：保护他人的同时也要保护好自己<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>14日，河北承德下起大雪，门卫大爷孙贵坚守在小区门口的防疫岗位上，已经被淋成了“雪人”，网友看到这一画面纷纷致敬。15日，社区为他建造了门卫房，还送来取暖用品，希望他在保护别人的同时，也能保护好自己。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuuhdoFOh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472662275880593:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472662275880593&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【男子违规硬闯小区 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%BB%E5%AD%90%E7%BB%84%E5%90%88%E6%8B%B3%E7%AE%A1%E6%95%99%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%23&amp;from=default">#妻子组合拳管教丈夫#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月14日，男子易某回家时拒不出示小区出入证明，还对疫情防控劝导的工作人员动手。易某妻子闻讯赶来，当众使出一套“组合拳”对易某进行管教。目前，易某已被公安机关依法行政处罚。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E6%B1%9F%E9%98%B3?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安江阳">@平安江阳</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472661008861656:1034-video:1034%3A4472295557627943:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472661008861656:2286908003" title="平安江阳的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hfePGk" alt="http://t.cn/A6hfePGk" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>平安江阳的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【全国铁路<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E8%B6%9F%E5%AE%9A%E5%88%B6%E5%8A%A1%E5%B7%A5%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%BF%94%E7%A8%8B%E4%B8%93%E5%88%97%E5%BC%80%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#首趟定制务工人员返程专列开行#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】16日13时57分，全国铁路首趟定制务工人员返程专列在贵阳北站开出，近300名务工人员从贵阳北站乘坐G4138次动车组列车前往杭州。为有效避免与其他非复工乘客的密切接触，最大程度地避免疫情传播风险，铁路部门在贵阳北站，开辟了绿色通道指定专人引导务工 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuubhbaKb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472658592662911:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472658592662911&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%B5%E5%B7%9E%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#贵州无新增确诊病例#</a>】2020年2月16日0—12时，贵州省无新增新冠肺炎确诊病例，新增治愈出院病例9例（贵阳市4例、遵义市2例、安顺市1例、毕节市1例、黔南州1例）。<br>截至2月16日12时，贵州省累计报告新型冠状病毒肺炎病例144例。其中，51例有武汉旅居史，14例有武汉外湖北其他地区 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IutZ75DSh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472651051344921:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472651051344921&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月16日 17:52</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%85%B3%E9%97%AD%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E9%9D%9E%E5%BF%85%E9%9C%80%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%9C%BA%E6%89%80%23&amp;from=default">#湖北关闭所有非必需公共场所#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%81%9C%E6%AD%A2%E4%B8%80%E5%88%87%E8%81%9A%E9%9B%86%E6%80%A7%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#停止一切聚集性活动#</a>】16日，湖北省人民政府发布“进一步强化新冠肺炎疫情防控”的通告：所有非必需的公共场所一律关闭，一切群众聚集性活动一律停止！做到“不漏一户、不落一人、不断一天”，确保全覆盖、无盲区。（湖北省人民政府）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hxmFBD" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxmFBD" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472642297977510" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IutKZxtjw?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 17:14" date="1581844484000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472642297977510:fromprofile"> 2月16日 17:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【返京人员未居家隔离 导致<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%9F%90%E5%8D%95%E4%BD%8D%E5%87%A0%E5%8D%81%E4%BA%BA%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#北京某单位几十人隔离#</a>】16日，北京市召开疫情防控新闻发布会，北京市疾病预防控制中心副主任庞星火通报一则确诊案例。该确诊病例年前自驾回老家过年，参加了亲戚朋友多次聚会聚餐。虽然个别亲戚当时有感冒症状，他们都没在意。大年初六一家人开车回到北京，初七这个病例正 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IutKZxtjw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472642297977510:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472642297977510&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【北京二级以上医院实行<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%9E%E6%80%A5%E8%AF%8A%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E9%A2%84%E7%BA%A6%23&amp;from=default">#非急诊全面预约#</a>】2月15日，北京新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作领导小组医疗保障组印发通知，要求全市三级医院原则上要在2月20日前、二级医院在2月25日前推行非急诊全面预约挂号。各医院取消现场挂号前，要对公众充分告知，并做好解释引导。<a title="北京市二级以上医院实行非急诊全面预约" href="http://t.cn/A6hJv43O" alt="http://t.cn/A6hJv43O" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>北京市二级以上医院实行非急诊全面预约</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609329354&amp;ssig=25CnSgJrxo" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472634882650856" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iutz2b7BK?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 16:45" date="1581842716000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472634882650856:fromprofile"> 2月16日 16:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【一条时间轴纵览习近平的战“疫”日志】新冠肺炎疫情发生以来，党中央高度重视，习近平总书记亲自部署、亲自指挥，多次召开会议、听取汇报、作出重要指示，要求各级党委和政府及有关部门制定周密方案，组织各方力量开展防控。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，习近平总书记的战“疫”日志↓↓（中国共产党新闻网） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iutz2b7BK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472634882650856:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472634882650856&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472631002771240" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IutsMbCVq?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 16:29" date="1581841791000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472631002771240:fromprofile"> 2月16日 16:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A9%BA%E6%B0%94%E5%87%80%E5%8C%96%E5%99%A8%E8%83%BD%E5%90%A6%E8%BF%87%E6%BB%A4%E6%8E%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#空气净化器能否过滤掉病毒#</a>？】中国疾控中心研究员冯录召：市场上常用的空气净化器是由风机和过滤装置组成。它主要适用于空气中的一种或多种污染物，并没有对病毒或其他病原微生物有杀灭率的要求，所以不一定能过滤掉病毒。一般家庭还是要每日通风换气，也应注意室内外温差大的情况，避免感冒。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IutsMbCVq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472631002771240:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472631002771240&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%A2%E5%A4%96%E7%83%AD%E6%88%90%E5%83%8F%E4%BD%93%E6%B8%A9%E4%BB%AA%E8%83%BD%E5%90%A6%E5%87%86%E7%A1%AE%E6%B5%8B%E6%B8%A9%23&amp;from=default">#红外热成像体温仪能否准确测温#</a>？】中国疾控中心研究员冯录召：红外热成像体温仪能够实现较远距离、非接触的情况下多目标同时进行体温检测，可以减少人员接触，相对安全便捷，但它的精确性受到外环境的影响，建议各地根据实际情况选择使用。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472629434158301:1042163-video:1042163%3A4472629352923159:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472629434158301:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hxdIzq" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxdIzq" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4472639748005862&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=5312263219&amp;commentmid=4472629434158301" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>2</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月16日 17:04</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

                                <a name="4472628200493415" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iutog24mj?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 16:18" date="1581841122000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472628200493415:fromprofile"> 2月16日 16:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8D%E5%BA%94%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%9B%9E%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#不应限制外出工作人员回小区#</a>】国家卫生健康委疾控局副局长周宇辉：可以在小区出入口设置体温监测点、严格人员登记，但不应限制外出工作人员回到小区。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472628200493415:1042163-video:1042163%3A4472628069728262:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472628200493415:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hxro66" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxro66" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

                    </div>
                </div>
                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E6%95%88%E6%9E%9C%E5%B7%B2%E7%BB%8F%E6%98%BE%E7%8E%B0%23&amp;from=default">#全国疫情防控效果已经显现#</a>】国家卫健委发言人米锋表示，截至2月15日24时，武汉、湖北、全国重症病例占确诊病例的比例均明显下降，其中武汉重症占确诊病例的比例，由1月28日的最高点32.4%波动下降至2月15日的21.6%，湖北其他地市重症占确诊病例的比例，由1月27日的最高点18.4%下降至2月 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IutmruopL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472627077243693:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472627077243693&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <!-- 时间 -->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9E%8B%E5%AD%90%E4%BC%9A%E6%8A%8A%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E5%B8%A6%E5%9B%9E%E5%AE%B6%E5%90%97%23&amp;from=default">#鞋子会把病毒带回家吗#</a>？】中国疾控中心研究员冯录召：新型冠状病毒目前主要还是通过近距离的呼吸道飞沫传播，或者接触传播。日常生活中无需对鞋底消毒，保持清洁即可，建议回家之后在门口换鞋。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472626666152710:1042163-video:1042163%3A4472626609848351:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472626666152710:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hxBSsi" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxBSsi" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：湖北省政府新冠肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会】2月16日16:00，湖北省新冠肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第25场新闻发布会，介绍宜昌市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作和福建省对口支援情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网">@人民网</a> 带您一起关注↓↓<br> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472623683886336:1034-video:1034%3A4474171875328007:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472623683886336:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hx3aTj" alt="http://t.cn/A6hx3aTj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                                <a name="4472620231627851" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iutbp6PtF?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 15:47" date="1581839223000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472620231627851:fromprofile"> 2月16日 15:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AF%B9%E5%AF%86%E5%88%87%E6%8E%A5%E8%A7%A6%E8%80%85%E9%87%87%E5%8F%96%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#对密切接触者采取集中隔离观察#</a>】中国疾控中心研究员冯录召：对密切接触者采取集中隔离医学观察，对于不具备条件的地区或者对于密切接触者里特殊的人群（婴幼儿、半自理、没有自理能力的人员）可以在社区医务人员的指导下，进行居家的医学观察。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472620231627851:1042163-video:1042163%3A4472620150882334:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472620231627851:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hxm2Pe" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxm2Pe" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                                <a name="4472616515120822" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iut5plu9U?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 15:32" date="1581838337000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472616515120822:fromprofile"> 2月16日 15:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【还是各种填表？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%87%8F%E8%BD%BB%E5%9F%BA%E5%B1%82%E8%B4%9F%E6%8B%85%23&amp;from=default">#如何减轻基层负担#</a>？】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%AB%E5%81%A5%E5%A7%94%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%A6%81%E5%87%8F%E8%BD%BB%E5%9F%BA%E5%B1%82%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%B4%9F%E6%8B%85%23&amp;from=default">#卫健委明确要减轻基层防疫人员负担#</a>：①国务院联防联控机制下发通知，要求减轻基层负担，全力做好基层防控工作。除传染病防治法要求填的表格外，其他总结报表一律暂停，同时信息应统筹共享，能不开的会就不开；②借助信息化的手段，明确通过信息直报系统上传数 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iut5plu9U" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472616515120822:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472616515120822&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7ingting7t" usercard="id=2940440783">77似酒</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><img src="https://h5.sinaimg.cn/upload/2017/04/11/409/vip_icon_zuanshi5_7.png" class="W_icon_vipstyle"></a>：别说了，我不信。每天各种报表没断过，各种工作记录少了要被骂。别说什么信息共享了，我们用上级部门的信息根本不可能，上级部门拿我们的信息我们得按照他们要求整理好了还得签保证书错了漏了都是我们基层的责任。        </div>

                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609329364&amp;ssig=JZOHQsKptg" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472616397858794" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iut5dwYqK?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 15:31" date="1581838309000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472616397858794:fromprofile"> 2月16日 15:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23400%E4%B8%87%E5%9F%BA%E5%B1%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E5%8D%AB%E7%94%9F%E6%9C%BA%E6%9E%84%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E9%BD%90%E4%B8%8A%E9%98%B5%23&amp;from=default">#400万基层医疗卫生机构医务人员齐上阵#</a>】国家卫健委基层卫生司副司长诸宏明：上海246家社区中心，34家设有发热门诊，24家24小时营业。400万基层医疗卫生机构的基层医务人员全出动，齐上阵。①坚守好阵地，做好预检分诊，做好隔离转诊；②正常的诊疗活动，常见病的诊疗，关注好老年人；③和社区工作 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iut5dwYqK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472616397858794:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472616397858794&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【送别！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E5%9C%A8%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#重庆民警牺牲在疫情防控一线#</a>】今天10时30分许，重庆市公安局沙坪坝区分局丰文派出所民警潘继明，带领辅警在辖区开展疫情防控工作时，突发心脏病，经抢救无效牺牲，年仅51岁。转发送别！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安重庆">@平安重庆</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/IusX6Cd1i&amp;mid=4472611369106516&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gby9dx62apj20g00pzjtr" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>77</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                            <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->
        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->
                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Iut3cfdHP&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 投诉 -->
                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=2101699451&amp;screen_name=我叫滑翔稽" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2101699451&amp;cid=4472615143627609&amp;nick=我叫滑翔稽&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                                                                                                                        【直播：国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会】2月16日15时，国务院联防联控机制召开新闻发布会，介绍新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作有关情况，敬请关注。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472608508604687:1034-video:1034%3A4473871223422995:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472608508604687:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hxlWw4" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxlWw4" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4472608298977901" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IusS9BFyR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 14:59" date="1581836378000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472608298977901:fromprofile"> 2月16日 14:59</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%A4%96%E5%8D%96%E5%91%98%E4%B9%B0%E8%8F%9C%E4%B9%B0%E8%8D%AF%E5%96%82%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9%23&amp;from=default">#武汉外卖员买菜买药喂宠物#</a>：我们存在本身就是个安慰<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_good_org.png" title="[good]" alt="[good]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】特殊时期，武汉外卖员不仅要替市民采买物资和药品，有时还帮人喂喂留守的小猫。他说：在这个时候，外卖员送什么不重要，我们存在本身就是个安慰，说明武汉还在运转。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B0%8F%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=小央视频">@小央视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472606440595389:2017607-video:2017607%3A4472600852627515:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472606440595389:2286908003" title="小央视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hx9DZ6" alt="http://t.cn/A6hx9DZ6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>小央视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月16日 14:52</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232%E6%9C%8817%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E6%9D%AD%E5%B7%9E%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%A4%E9%80%9A%E6%AD%A3%E5%B8%B8%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%23&amp;from=default">#2月17日起杭州城市公共交通正常运营#</a>】记者获悉，为保障城市正常运行，满足复工复产出行需求，经杭州市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作领导小组批准，决定自2020年2月17日零时起，恢复杭州市城市公共交通和市域道路客运正常运营。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%92%B1%E6%B1%9F%E6%99%9A%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=钱江晚报">@钱江晚报</a><br>一、地铁1、2、4号线及5号线首通段发车间隔恢复正常。<br>二、主城区公 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IusBgneIS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472597825538142:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472597825538142&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        </li>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4472597825538142"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>104</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4472597825538142&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/1849167532" usercard="id=1849167532">凉水井划船</a>：大多数中国人都是安全的、没风险的，只要把疑似排除了，社会应该减少一些限制了。        </div>

                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>
                            <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->
        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472596043214835" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iusyodukb?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 14:10" date="1581833456000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472596043214835:fromprofile"> 2月16日 14:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【云南药监局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E5%8F%AF%E5%85%88%E7%94%9F%E4%BA%A7%E5%90%8E%E5%AE%A1%E6%89%B9%23&amp;from=default">#疫情防控物资可先生产后审批#</a>】日前，云南省药品监督管理局印发通知，按照应急物资可“先生产后审批”原则，明确疫情防控用一次性使用医用口罩、医用外科口罩、医用防护口罩和医用一次性防护服等医疗物资，生产企业具备生产条件、试生产样品合格，向省药监局申请，符合要求的即可生产上 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iusyodukb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472596043214835:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472596043214835&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                                                                                                                        【直播：上海市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会】2月16日14:00，上海市召开新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会，敬请关注↓↓<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472593685797815:1034-video:1034%3A4474121682354192:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472593685797815:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hx6FsO" alt="http://t.cn/A6hx6FsO" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472591907680916" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IusrIwe9K?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 13:54" date="1581832470000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472591907680916:fromprofile"> 2月16日 13:54</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【网友热议：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%99%BD%E8%A1%A3%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB%E6%98%AF%E6%97%B6%E4%BB%A3%E7%9A%84%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#白衣战士是时代的英雄#</a>】2月15日，人民网刊发《人民网评：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%AF%B7%E6%8E%88%E4%BA%88%E6%AE%89%E8%81%8C%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%E7%A7%B0%E5%8F%B7%23&amp;from=default">#请授予殉职医护人员烈士称号#</a>》呼吁给所有殉职的医护人员一个应得的烈士称号。网友对此积极响应，截至2月16日中午在各平台累计发布评论近10万，网友纷纷留言表达对白衣战士的崇高敬意，并支持授予殉职医护人员烈士称号。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IusrIwe9K" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472591907680916:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472591907680916&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->
                
				     <!--picture_count == 2 || picture_count == 3-->

                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IusuSahuM&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->

                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【村民<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8C%91%E5%8D%81%E4%BD%99%E9%87%8C%E6%89%81%E6%8B%85%E7%BB%99%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E9%80%81%E5%BE%AE%E6%B3%A2%E7%82%89%23&amp;from=default">#挑十余里扁担给防疫人员送微波炉#</a>：想让他们吃口热饭】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>2月12日，山东淄川一处疫情防控检查点，一位村民得知天气要变冷，用扁担挑来一个微波炉和一箱苹果，放下后转身就走，只留下一句“让你们吃口热饭”。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%BD%90%E9%B2%81%E6%99%9A%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=齐鲁晚报">@齐鲁晚报</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472588791708239:1034-video:1034%3A4472344471601199:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472588791708239:2286908003" title="齐鲁晚报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hIfFrL" alt="http://t.cn/A6hIfFrL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>齐鲁晚报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472584647335080" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iusg0uMbK?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 13:25" date="1581830739000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472584647335080:fromprofile"> 2月16日 13:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E4%B8%8D%E6%97%A9%E4%BA%8E3%E6%9C%881%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#山西开学不早于3月1日#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%B6%88%E6%81%AF%23&amp;from=default">#各地开学最新消息#</a>2月15日，山西省教育厅发布相关通知，山西省大中小学和幼儿园春季学期开学时间不得早于3月1日，具体开学时间，经综合研判确定后，另行通知。所有校外培训机构在开学前不得开展任何形式的线下培训，不得举办任何形式的聚集性培训活动；线上培训不得违规组 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iusg0uMbK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472584647335080:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472584647335080&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%89%80%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E9%9B%B6%E5%8F%B7%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E4%BC%A0%E9%97%BB%23&amp;from=default">#武汉病毒所回应零号病人传闻#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E7%87%95%E7%8E%B2%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E7%9B%B4%E5%9C%A8%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#黄燕玲毕业后一直在其他省份工作#</a> 未曾被感染】2月16日，中国科学院武汉病毒研究所发表声明：<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;近期网络流传不实信息，称我所毕业生黄燕玲是所谓的最早感染新冠病毒的“零号病人”。经查证，我所郑重声明如下：<br>　　黄燕玲同学于2015年在我所毕业获得硕士学位 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IusekbmiE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472583602707332:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472583602707332&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <ul class="WB_row_line WB_row_r4 clearfix S_line2">

                                <a name="4472582629515886" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuscKDVw2?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 13:17" date="1581830257000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472582629515886:fromprofile"> 2月16日 13:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%83%91%E5%B7%9E3%E5%90%8D%E6%82%A3%E5%84%BF%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#郑州3名患儿出院#</a> 最小的6个月大】2月14日，河南省儿童医院3名确诊的孩子，迎来最幸福的时刻。推开隔离病房门，两名女孩蹦蹦跳跳地跑了出来，一名医护人员将婴儿抱到其家人手上。3人经过治疗与护理后，都已符合相关标准痊愈出院。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472582629515886:2017607-video:2017607%3A4472578207842346:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472582629515886:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hxbIPi" alt="http://t.cn/A6hxbIPi" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【男子辱骂援鄂医疗队医护人员 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%AE%E5%8D%9A%E7%BD%91%E5%90%8D%E9%97%AB%E5%BF%A0%E6%96%87bot%E8%A2%AB%E6%8B%9815%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#微博网名闫忠文bot被拘15日#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E7%9B%90%E5%9F%8E?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安盐城">@平安盐城</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;通报：2月11日，41岁男子闫某文通过微博对盐城市援鄂医疗队医护人员进行辱骂，造成恶劣社会影响。经审查，闫某文对违法行为供认不讳。目前，闫某文因寻衅滋事已被盐城公安机关拘留15日，并处罚款1000元。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472580805644670:1034-video:1034%3A4472550001147914:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472580805644670:2286908003" title="盐城网警巡查执法的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hM3KlM" alt="http://t.cn/A6hM3KlM" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>盐城网警巡查执法的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609329371&amp;ssig=hClnBPfW8G" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472574367169508" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IurZqu57e?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 12:44" date="1581828288000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472574367169508:fromprofile"> 2月16日 12:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【面对外媒层层追问，王毅精彩回应】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;当地时间2月14日，国务委员兼外长王毅针对新冠肺炎疫情等问题在柏林接受专访。王毅说，这场疫情突如其来，确实给中国和世界带来了一次严峻挑战。但中国政府和人民经受住了考验，用自己的努力甚至牺牲赢得了国际社会的尊重和认可。专访详戳↓↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IurZqu57e" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472574367169508:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472574367169508&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609329371&amp;ssig=hClnBPfW8G" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472572298734301" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IurW5AEbP?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 12:36" date="1581827795000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472572298734301:fromprofile"> 2月16日 12:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【等春来，又是一番好光景！】比利时钢琴家尚·马龙为中国创作“战疫防疫”国际公益曲《黎明的编钟声》，歌曲融入编钟等湖北元素，并配中文独白：“天空和钟声一同醒来了，樱花在温暖的春风中飞扬。武汉，我们在等你！”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>“武汉加油！中国加油！我们在一起”成为国际社会的主流声音。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IurW5AEbP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472572298734301:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472572298734301&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>【“人民战‘疫’”公益海报|我们一定能战胜这次疫情！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】打赢疫情防控阻击战，我们在行动。各企业也第一时间纷纷加入驰援疫情防控队伍当中，展现出企业的社会责任与正气。人民网公益频道用“人民战‘疫’”公益海报记录这场全民防疫阻击战中的暖心时刻，为打赢这场人民守卫战加油 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IurPmpG0T" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472568126119703:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472568126119703&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【暖心！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B4%E8%90%A8%E8%B5%9B%E5%89%8D%E5%A3%B0%E6%8F%B4%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#巴萨赛前声援中国#</a>：同心战疫，命运与共！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】北京时间周六晚23点，西甲联赛开球前，巴塞罗那俱乐部球员们手牵着身穿“中国加油“球衣的华裔小球童走进球场，表示对中国的声援。场中展现“同心战疫，命运与共”标语，向受到新型冠状病毒疫情影响的中国人民表达支持与鼓励。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IurIemDEo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472563705395636:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472563705395636&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E8%97%8F%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD17%E5%A4%A9%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西藏连续17天无新增确诊病例#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 截止2月15日24时，西藏现有新冠肺炎确诊病例0例，重症病例0例，死亡病例0例，疑似病例0例，治愈出院病例1例。累计确诊新冠肺炎病例1例。（西藏卫建委）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hMstW5" alt="http://t.cn/A6hMstW5" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                <div class="WB_screen W_fr" node-type="fl_screen_box">
    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472560651755008" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IurDj7myA?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 11:50" date="1581825017000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472560651755008:fromprofile"> 2月16日 11:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8E%95%E6%89%80%E9%97%A8%E5%BD%93%E9%BB%91%E6%9D%BF%E5%A4%A7%E8%91%B1%E5%BD%93%E6%95%99%E9%9E%AD%23&amp;from=default">#厕所门当黑板大葱当教鞭#</a> 高三老师硬核直播讲课】近日，吉林松原，一名高三生物老师直播讲课网络走红。因开直播上课准备仓促，设备也不齐全，老师就用厕所门临时当黑板，教鞭就在厨房找了根大葱。有网友表示，老师让课堂别有风味。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472560651755008:2017607-video:2017607%3A4472548004659212:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472560651755008:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hMmwUC" alt="http://t.cn/A6hMmwUC" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E5%8A%9E%E5%85%AC%E6%9B%B4%E8%BD%BB%E6%9D%BE%E8%BF%98%E6%98%AF%E6%9B%B4%E7%B4%AF%23&amp;from=default">#居家办公更轻松还是更累#</a>？】疫情之下，不少人居家办公。然而很多人发现，在家上班并不轻松，几乎24小时待命，工作时间大大延长，反倒比正常上班更累。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a>居家办公的你加班了吗？比以前更累还是更轻松？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472558181601390:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_256334_-_c135d6" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_256334_-_c135d6" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_256334_-_c135d6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4472556809907855" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iurx6Fzu7?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-16 11:35" date="1581824102000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472556809907855:fromprofile"> 2月16日 11:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E6%8D%95%E6%9D%80%E5%B9%B6%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8%E6%9E%9C%E5%AD%90%E7%8B%B8%E8%A2%AB%E6%9F%A5%E5%A4%84%23&amp;from=default">#男子捕杀并食用果子狸被查处#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E5%90%83%E9%87%8E%E5%91%B3%23&amp;from=default">#拒绝吃野味#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/f6/2018new_nu_org.png" title="[怒]" alt="[怒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，贵州<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%83%E6%98%9F%E5%85%B3%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=七星关公安">@七星关公安</a> 团结派出所查处一起偷猎并食用野生动物果子狸的违法行为人。经审讯，胡某交代其因疫情爆发闲赋在家，便用捕猎器去山上打点“野味”。其将捕猎器安装在后山的树林中，通过非法手段捕获了两只野生动物果子狸，随后自行宰杀食用 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iurx6Fzu7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472556809907855:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472556809907855&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/1773237533" usercard="id=1773237533">桃小古月</a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans6"></i></a>：玛德铁憨憨，无知无识的，你不知道你为什么闲在家里吗？？还敢吃，景云山等着你！        </div>

                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IurxDrYEN&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->

                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                                                                                 【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/8a\/2018new_xin_org.png\" title=\"[心]\" alt=    \"[心]\" type=\"face\" \/>】16日13时57分，全国铁路首趟定制务工人员返程专列在贵阳北站开出，近300名务工人员从贵阳北站乘坐G4138次动车组列车前往杭州。为有效避免与其他非复工乘客的密切接触，最大程度地避免疫情传播风险，铁路部门在贵阳北站，开辟了绿色通道指定专人引导务工 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                               【北京二级以上医院实行<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"  title=\"北京市二级以上医院实行非急诊全面预约\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6hJv43O\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6hJv43O\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4472631002771240:fromprofile\"> 2月16日 16:29<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" action-type=\"app_source\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民网\">\n                                                                                                                        【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%A9%BA%E6%B0%94%E5%87%80%E5%8C%96%E5%99%A8%E8%83%BD%E5%90%A6%E8%BF%87%E6%BB%A4%E6%8E%89%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&from=default\">#空气净化器能否过滤掉病毒#<\/a>？】中国疾控中心研究员冯录召：市场上常用的空气净化器是由风机和过滤装置组成。它主要适用于空气中的一种或多种污染物，并没有对病毒或其他病原微生物有杀灭率的要求，所以不一定能过滤掉病毒。一般家庭还是要每日通风换气，也应注意室内外温差大的情况，避免感冒。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/IutsMbCVq\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4472631002771240:2286908003\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\"
